__e: How does it feel, waiting to be executed?
If you put me back in jail, I don't want to live each day wondering if I'll be hanged.
But if we can't find a way to push back the execution, then in 30 days it won't matter anymore.
You'll wanna save your "no frigging way" for the next part. My execution was faked by a secret unit of the government called Division.
"The Nazi terrorist is too much for us!" Svoboda... three years ago we lost our army.
Unless any of you think that the King, or France, would benefit from the execution of his own mother?
Come on, Beth. I know the hanging's in less than a week.
I would like to know. Is this an assassination?
